decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (  Pages 4, 6 and 7 of document titled N.1 Chiswick Quay, presentation 1.1. 
Received: 04 August 2014
S-L-01, S-L-02, S-L-04 Received 3/10/14
) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Alterations to the front elevation comprising of new door with high level windows and the construction of a lightwell to the rear ground floor of the existing house
